column1: The Pit Room////Ummmmm im so confused
column2: maybe its because i had such high hopes for this place. The BBQ is just okay
column3: i mean if you ever had a uncle
column6: brother get on the BBQ pit then this no comparison. When i pulled up I knew when i didnt see a smoke stack i should have known. I got the 3 meat plate with venison sausage
column7: ribs and brisket. The sausage was good but everything else was just okay. I didnt go crazy for it. The bbq sauce was really good
column8: a little spicy but i liked that. The mac and cheese was watery and the potato salad was alright. Overall
column9: good but not great. I probably will just get my friend
column10: uncle or someone to fire up the pit and save some money next time.
